title: The Dollar Doodle
description: When Nora's friend is accused of kleptomania, Nick agrees to investigate and discovers a link to a gang of blackmailers.

title: The Duke of Sing Sing
description: When a criminal tells Nick he will get revenge for sending him to jail, Nick decides to take up judo.

title: The Angel Biz
description: Nick investigates when the star of the play he's invested in is murdered. Nora insists on working with Nick because the dead man was found in her niece's apartment.

title: Come Back Darling Asta
description: Nick and Nora search for the owner of a silk handkerchief brought home by their dog, Asta, and discover a corpse.

title: Paris Pendant
description: While visiting Paris, Nora receives a beautiful pendant and discovers that she isn't the only person that wants to possess the necklace.

title: That's the Spirit
description: Nick attends a s√©ance and is surprised when a mysterious voice claims that a death thought by the police to be an accident was really murder.

title: Acrostic Murders
description: Nick and Nora discover a murderer by solving an acrostic puzzle.

title: The Dead Duck
description: A gangster and his moll take a predatory interest in the manuscript for Nora's mystery novel.

title: Fatal Cliche
description: While visiting an art museum, Nick and Nora become involved in the theft of rare coins from the gallery's safe.

title: Ring Around Rosie
description: While Nick throws a wedding party, his enemies rig his car with an explosive device.

title: Angels in Paradise
description: While attempting to assist a former servant, Nick and Nora become the target of a murder who uses darts as a weapon

title: The Fashion Showdown
description: When a model doesn't show up for a charity fashion show, Nora agrees to take her place, not realizing the gown identifies the wearer as the woman to be murdered.

title: The Dead Giveaway
description: Nick competes against a criminologist on a game-show panel until another contestant is poisoned.

title: Unwelcome Alibi
description: When an agent is accused of murder, his only alibi is a beautiful blonde bimbo whose testimony would end his marriage.

title: Asta Day
description: Nick and Nora recount how their dog Asta was responsible for bringing them together.

title: The Scene Stealer
description: Nick accepts a job in Hollywood as a technical advisor for a mobster film. When valuable props start to disappear, Nick agrees to investigate.

title: Damone Dilemma
description: Vic Damone asks the Charles's assistance in ridding himself of a stalker.

title: Unlucky Lucky Number
description: Nick and Nora decide their apartment is too small so they search for another with more space. Of course, the model they like comes with a corpse in the closet.

title: Man on the Bridge
description: While playing with his new telescope, Nick spots a man behaving oddly on a nearby bridge. When he later meets the same man at a party for a visiting Middle Eastern diplomat, Nick suspects that the foreign dignitary is in danger.

title: The Pre-Incan Caper
description: Bored with life, Nick threatens a return his career as a private detective. In order to discourage him from taking such a step, a friend bets Nick that he can't discover how he has stolen a priceless Inca artifact.

title: Murder Is Where You Find It
description: Nick and Nora investigate a murder in an ice-cream parlor where the only witness is a blind man.

title: Ship Shakedown
description: While on a Caribbean cruise, Nick and Nora investigate a burglary where the stolen goods are discovered in a fellow passenger's stateroom. The accused man is a New York City policeman who swears he was framed.

title: Robot Client
description: Nick and Nora visit the inventor of a robot. They wonder if the mechanical man might have been the instrument for murder.

title: The Mystery of the Missing Murders
description: Nick swears there was a dead body in the Charles's apartment but when the police arrive the corpse has disappeared.

title: Double Jeopardy
description: A psychotic killer, deported from the United States, returns to the country to kill Nick.

title: Bookworms
description: Nora buys a used book which turns out to be a rare first-edition. The book was sold by mistake and the thieves who stole the book in the first place are intent on recovering the volume.

title: Jittery Juror
description: A condemned murdered vows to return from the grave to avenge himself upon the jury that convicted him. When three of the jurors are found slain, Nick and Nora decide to investigate.

title: The Departed Doctor
description: When a doctor disappears from a dude ranch, Nick and Nora mount horses to investigate.

title: The Tennis Champ
description: When a tennis player dies mysteriously, Nick suspects foul play and discovers that the man was hated by most of his fellow competitors.

title: The Delinquent
description: Nick and Nora go undercover to infiltrate a gang of murderous hot-rodders.

title: The Painted Witnesses
description: Nick and Nora find a corpse at a charity carnival.

title: The Saucer People
description: Nick and Nora are suspicious when a scientist friend swears that he has seen the inside of a flying saucer.

title: The Carstadt Man
description: Nick investigates when a paleontologist is found murdered while examining old bones.

title: The Art of Murder
description: Nora witnesses a murder. The killer, an actor who is a master of disguise, visits Nora in a number of different impersonations to see if she can recognize him.

title: Kappa Kappa Kaper
description: Nick attends homecoming at his college and is asked to investigate when the school's mascot, a seal, is stolen.

title: The Valley Forger
description: Nick investigates when an expensive pin that Nora did not purchase is charged to her account. Along the way, he uncovers two murders and learns that Nora is slated to be a third victim

title: The Screaming Doll
description: Nick and Nora investigate when a calypso singer receives a voodoo doll and mysteriously looses his voice.

title: The Case of the Baggy Pants
A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Morgue
description: On live television, a comic star is shot to death during a program. It turns out that though he was a funny fellow for his audience, off-camera he was a hated bully to his staff, so there's plenty of suspects.

title: Mayhem to Music
description: Nick and Nora's new neighbor is an arrogant,unlikable piano genius who even throws things at Asta. When Nora pays him a visit, she ends up locked in a closet and the musical virtuoso murdered.

title: Gory Road
description: People start dying after a novelist announces on TV that her forthcoming book will reveal those responsible for a big swindle involving state roads.
